name: routeChangeNotification
desc: A notification the system posts when its audio route changes.

items.name: let AVAudioSessionRouteChangeReasonKey: String
items.desc: A user info key that’s used to retrieve the route change reason.

items.name: let AVAudioSessionRouteChangePreviousRouteKey: String
items.desc: A user info key that’s used to retrieve the previously active audio session route.

items.name: enum AVAudioSession.RouteChangeReason
items.desc: Constants that indicate the reason for an audio route change.
